meanings.definition: A person with whom one communicates regularly through email or messaging.
meanings.sent1: My keypal and I share stories and jokes through email.
meanings.sent2: I have a new keypal from another country who I chat with online.
meanings.sent3: My keypal and I pretend to be secret agents in our email exchanges.
meanings.sent4: Having a keypal is like having a pen pal, but through the internet.
meanings.sent5: My keypal is like a digital friend who I can talk to anytime.

meanings.definition: To correspond with someone regularly through email or messaging.
meanings.sent1: I keypal with my cousin who lives far away to stay in touch.
meanings.sent2: She keypals with her best friend to share updates and news.
meanings.sent3: We keypal about our favorite TV shows and recommend new ones to watch.
meanings.sent4: Keypaling with someone is a great way to maintain a long-distance friendship.
meanings.sent5: Keypaling allows us to communicate instantly, no matter where we are.
